law.catch_line: Registration fee for generator of hazardous waste.

text.section: If a generator of hazardous waste submits to the cabinet a registration to modify any information other than its waste streams, it shall be subject to a fee by the cabinet of fifty dollars ($50).
The cabinet shall not impose a fee if a generator of hazardous waste modifies a registration by making a name change.

law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 471, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1990.
